main event: An object was observed at 3:00 PM on October 8, 1960, exhibiting rapid zigzag motion for approximately 16 minutes.
interesting points: The observed object had a tail that was 10-20 times the size of its main body., The object disappeared quickly at 3:15 PM., Other lights were noted in the area during the sighting., Witnesses suspected it might be a meteor due to its swift movement., There was a conclusion that further investigation was needed.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with a tail
